backend/main.mo: Motoko actor exposing five async calculation methods: perimeter from wheel rotations, rectangle area, square area, irregular area from triangles, and area-from-rotations supporting square or rectangle shapes.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping four PWA-related features (barn logo icon generation, manifest.json update, index.html update, service worker setup) to their associated files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Auto-generated JSON document containing one-to-two sentence summaries of all frontend source files, serving as a build-planning reference for the project's components, hooks, styles, and PWA assets.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS stylesheet defining OKLCH-based design tokens for light and dark modes, including background, foreground, primary, card, chart, and sidebar color variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point configuring PWA meta tags, barn logo favicon and apple-touch-icon, manifest link, white theme-color, and inline service worker registration script.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA web app manifest for 'SPA For Accurate Measure' specifying standalone display, white colors, and three barn logo icon sizes (180×180, 192×192, 512×512) pointing to generated asset paths.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker using cache-first strategy for static assets (including barn logo icons) and network-first for ICP API calls, with versioned cache 'spa-accurate-measure-v2' and full app-shell precaching on install.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component wrapping the app in QueryClientProvider with a sticky primary-colored header, main content sections (FieldCalculator, ConsiderationsPanel, FormulaReference, UnitConversions), and a footer with caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/ConsiderationsPa: Amber-themed tips panel rendering three measurement considerations (wheel slip, path accuracy, irregular fields) as icon-and-text rows inside a rounded card.
Main calculator component that manages form state for rectangle, square, irregular, rotation, and perimeter calculations, dispatching mutations via React Query hooks and displaying results.
frontend/src/components/FormulaReference: Static display component that lists all supported calculation formulas with examples in a styled reference card.
Form component for irregular field area calculation that allows adding/removing triangles, each with base and height inputs.
Form component with two inputs—wheel circumference and rotation count—for calculating field perimeter.
Form component with length and width inputs for rectangular field area calculation.
frontend/src/components/ResultsDisplay.t: Displays calculated area (in m², acres, and hectares) and perimeter (in meters and kilometers) in a styled results card.
frontend/src/components/RotationInputs.t: Form component for rotation-based area calculation, accepting wheel circumference, rotation count, field shape (square/rectangle), and optional width.
frontend/src/components/ShapeSelector.ts: Grid button selector component for choosing between rectangle, square, irregular, and rotation-count field shape modes.
frontend/src/components/SquareInputs.tsx: Simple form component with a single side-length input for square field area calculation.
Static display component showing a reference table of common unit conversions between hectares, acres, meters, and miles.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider and useInternetIdentity hook for managing Internet Identity authentication state, including login, logout, and identity persistence via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Exports React Query mutation hooks for calling backend canister methods: perimeter calculation, rectangle/square/irregular area, and area-from-wheel-rotations.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS stylesheet defining an earthy green agricultural color palette via CSS custom properties for both light and dark modes, plus mobile-safe-area and touch-target utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that mounts the app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with custom colors (mapped to CSS variables), fonts, border radii, shadows, and animations, plus animate/typography/container-queries plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks the project's current state, architectural notes, existing features, and new feature requests for a PWA land area calculator app ('SPA For Accurate Measure') with barn logo icons and offline support.
